channel.title: Death on My Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content in Death on My Blog Site

item.title: Because I could not stop for death
item.description: Because I could not stop for Death, He kindly stopped for me; The carriage held but just ourselves And Immortality. We slowly drove, he knew no haste, And I had put away My labor, and my leisure too, For his civility. We passed the school, where children strove At recess, in the ring; We passed the fields of gazing grain, We passed the setting sun. Or rather, he passed us;
